paper_abstract: The paper presents new criteria for bijectivity/transitivity of T-functions and a fast knapsack-like algorithm of evaluation of a T-function. Our approach is based on non-Archimedean ergodic theory: Both the criteria and algorithm use van der Put series to represent 1-Lipschitz p-adic functions and to study measure-preservation/ergodicity of these.
paper_title: T-functions revisited: new criteria for bijectivity/transitivity
